concept.title: Shutting down the appliance
concept.shortdesc: You can shut down the appliance either by using the or by using the device shutdown command on the command line.

conbody.p: Shutting down the appliance is not the same as stopping the server. When you shut down the appliance, you shut down the hardware. When you stop the server, you stop only the processes that run on the hardware. For more information about stopping the server, see .
When you shut down the appliance, the is unavailable until the appliance is turned on again.
